title: Atley the cub bear
subtitle: 2. Help when you can.
author: Barbara Lee
theme: Little animals' learning to treat others with kindness.

pages.story_text: Atley the cub bear was playing in the forest when he saw a bird sitting on a branch, looking sad.
pages.image_description: A chubby bird with a long neck and colorful feathers sitting on a branch.

pages.story_text: Atley the cub bear was playing hide-and-seek with his friends, the cat, the dog, the rabbit, and the bird.
pages.image_description: A playful cub bear with a bright smile is hiding behind a tree.

pages.story_text: Atley the cub bear was tired of watching the other animals play. He wanted to join in, but he was too shy.
pages.image_description: Atley sitting alone in a clearing.

pages.story_text: Atley scurried through the forest, his little legs carrying him as he chased butterflies. He bumped into a playful rabbit hopping by, causing the rabbit to giggle.
pages.image_description: A smiling rabbit with fluffy fur and bright eyes.

pages.story_text: Atley scurried through the forest, his eyes searching for adventure. He spotted a butterfly fluttering by and grinned.
pages.image_description: A playful cub bear with a bright smile and long, fluffy fur.

pages.story_text: Atley the cub bear was having a lot of fun playing with his friends, the cat, the dog, the rabbit, and the bird. They were running around the forest, chasing butterflies and playing hide-and-seek.
pages.image_description: A group of animals playing in a sunny forest.

pages.story_text: Atley scurried through the undergrowth, his little heart pounding with excitement. Today was his turn to help the forest animals!
pages.image_description: A playful cub bear with bright eyes and a fluffy belly.

pages.story_text: Atley scurried through the forest, his tiny paws tapping softly on the leaves. He bumped into a butterfly, its wings painted in vibrant colors.
pages.image_description: A happy butterfly with colorful wings fluttering in the sunlight.
